name: Camping and Rafting at CHILLOUT
description:
Revel in Camp Chillout that nestles on a scenic beach camp at Byasi placed on the banks of the mystic River Ganga. It is 30km passed Rishikesh on Badrinath road. The riveting camp stay is surrounded by lush bountiful teak forest where fresh air of mountains comes wafting through.

The professional and dedicated staff at the camp ensure to meet your expectations as an adventure camp. Apart from camping, you can relish in adrenaline pumping adventure activities like white water rafting, repelling, rock climbing, kayaking, hiking and a lot more. For the spiritually inclined, yoga and meditation classes are provided on special request. The tranquil surroundings and inviting landscapes make for a perfect backdrop for adventure activities and yoga.
